locations.name: The Ranch
locations.description: The player's home base where they can raise slimes and grow crops.

locations.name: The Dry Reef
locations.description: A coral-crusted ocean floor that now basks under a golden sun.

locations.name: The Moss Blanket
locations.description: A wild, untamed thicket of flora that is home to some of the most dangerous slimes.

locations.name: The Indigo Quarry
locations.description: A winding network of caves and cliffs, home to rock and crystal slimes.

locations.name: The Ancient Ruins
locations.description: A mysterious and ancient place filled with strange technology and quantum slimes.

locations.name: The Glass Desert
locations.description: A vast, shimmering desert that is home to fire and mosaic slimes.

locations.name: The Slime Sea
locations.description: An endless expanse of water that surrounds the Far, Far Range.

locations.name: The Wilds
locations.description: A dangerous and untamed area filled with feral slimes.

locations.name: Nimble Valley
locations.description: A special area where players can participate in Mochi Miles' Quicksilver Slime races.

locations.name: Ogden's Retreat
locations.description: A lush, tropical area where players can help Ogden Ortiz grow exotic fruits.

locations.name: Victor's Workshop
locations.description: A high-tech area where players can assist Victor Humphries with his research on glitch slimes.
